n2o:sql.n2o:items-query: select :select from d_accounting.account d_ac join public.pim_indiv_code indc ON indc.code = d_ac.patient_uid AND indc.type_id = (select ctype.id from pim_code_type ctype where ctype.code = 'UID' limit 1) join public.pim_individual ind ON ind.id = indc.indiv_id join public.pim_organization org ON org.id = d_ac.clinic_id where :where AND d_ac.is_removed order by :order
n2o:sql.n2o:count-query: select count(1) from d_accounting.account d_ac join public.pim_indiv_code indc ON indc.code = d_ac.patient_uid AND indc.type_id = (select ctype.id from pim_code_type ctype where ctype.code = 'UID' limit 1) join public.pim_individual ind ON ind.id = indc.indiv_id join public.pim_organization org ON org.id = d_ac.clinic_id where :where AND d_ac.is_removed

field.name: Дата выдачи
field.expression: (select passport.issue_dt from pim_individual_doc passport where passport.indiv_id = ind.id and passport.type_id = (select dtype.id from pim_doc_type dtype where dtype.code = 'PASSPORT_RUSSIAN_FEDERATION' limit 1) limit 1)

field.expression: (select concat(polic.series, ' ', polic.number) from pim_individual_doc polic where polic.indiv_id = ind.id and polic.type_id in (select dtype.id from pim_doc_type dtype where dtype.code in ('MHI_UNIFORM', 'MHI_OLDER')) order by polic.type_id desc limit 1)

field.name: Дата выдачи
field.expression: (select polic.issue_dt from pim_individual_doc polic where polic.indiv_id = ind.id and polic.type_id in (select dtype.id from pim_doc_type dtype where dtype.code in ('MHI_UNIFORM', 'MHI_OLDER')) order by polic.type_id desc limit 1)

field.name: Адрес регистрации
field.expression: (SELECT adr__get_element_as_text (padr.addr_id, '(1,s,0)(2,s,0)(3,s,0)(4,s,0)(5,s,0)(6,s,0)(7,s,0)(8,s,0)(9,s,0)') FROM pim_party_address padr JOIN pim_party party ON party.id = padr.party_id JOIN pim_address_type adr_type ON adr_type.party_type_id = party.type_id AND adr_type.code = 'REGISTER' WHERE padr.party_id = ind.id limit 1)

field.name: Адрес проживания
field.expression: (SELECT adr__get_element_as_text (padr.addr_id, '(1,s,0)(2,s,0)(3,s,0)(4,s,0)(5,s,0)(6,s,0)(7,s,0)(8,s,0)(9,s,0)') FROM pim_party_address padr JOIN pim_party party ON party.id = padr.party_id JOIN pim_address_type adr_type ON adr_type.party_type_id = party.type_id AND adr_type.code = 'ACTUAL' WHERE padr.party_id = ind.id limit 1)

field.name: СМО
